hymn.title: Put on therefore, as God's chosen ones

layout.singingstanza: Put on there -- fore, as God's cho -- sen ones, ho -- ly and be -- lov -- ed, in -- ward parts of com -- pas -- sion, kind -- ness, low -- li -- ness, meek -- ness, long -- suf -- fer -- ing; Bear -- ing one an -- oth -- er and for -- giv -- ing one an -- oth -- er, if an -- y -- one should have a com -- plaint a -- gainst an -- y -- one; e -- ven as the Lord for -- gave you, so al -- so should you for -- give.

lyrics.stanza: Put on therefore, as God's chosen ones, Holy and beloved, Inward parts of compassion, Kindness, lowliness, Meekness, long-suffering;
Bearing one another and forgiving one another, If anyone should have a complaint against anyone; Even as the Lord forgave you, So also should you forgive.
